text: A HEAVY NIGHT MIST swirls around the imposing stone walls the Bastille. PRISON GUARDS patrol outside with their pik as the SCREAMS OF PRISONERS echo out the barred windows.

A pair of huge PRISON GUARDS walk down a row of filthy pr cells. Whimpering, starving PRISONERS appear and disappea the flickering light of the wall torches. A large rat nib some stale bread in the corner, watching the guards. Finally, the two guards reach a cell whose PRISONER is no all whimpering or starving. A huge Scotsman with a proud defiance in his eyes, a RED SQUARE MEDALLION dangling aro his neck, glares through the bars. This is JAMES McCULLEN The guards unlock his cell door, MATCHLOCK MUSKETS at the ready. McCullen stares at the muskets, unimpressed. He sp with a thick Scottish brogue.
Still using matchlocks, are ya? I can get you a pair of flintlocks, you let me sneak out of here. Everyone else in this sequence speaks with a French accen
(TEMPTED)
Good ones? The other Guard glares at him. McCullen goes for the kill
The best. From Spain. And perhaps a couple of pretty young ladies to teach you how to use them. Guard #1 is even more tempted, but his partner is a Loyal
On yer feet, you Scottish pig. 2.

Huge, sweaty, bare-chested PRISON WORKERS mould something a furnace, a large chunk of metal in their red hot tongs. two prison guards muscle McCullen into the room and start fasten him to a standing rack as a PRIEST begins reciting Lord's Prayer in Latin. The Warden steps up and reads the charges off a SCROLL OF PAPER.
James McCullen, you have been found guilty of treason for the sale of military arms to the enemies of our Lord King Louis XIII... even whilst you sold arms to our Lord himself.
Your King is a vile bag of filth who murders his own allies. I should've charged him double.
You tried to overthrow the Crown in conspiracy with its enemies!
They offered me a Chancellorship, because unlike your simpleton King, they know that is the McCullen destiny, to run the wars, the true power, not simply to supply arms.
Do you have anything else to say before the sentence is carried out?

Yes, I do. Clan McCullen is far bigger and more powerful than any of you could ever imagine. My sons will continue to rise along after I am gone. As will their sons. And, God willing, their sons. (SMILES)
It shall not end with my death. The Warden smiles back sinisterly.

Oh, we're not going to kill you, McCullen. We're going to make an example of you. 3. The Warden gives a nod to the prison workers who remove t METALLIC OBJECT from the fire. McCullen sees what it is before we do and his face fills with fear. It's a METAL M being carried towards him, the hinges open with a hideous creak. McCullen begins to struggle against the rack.

So that no man, woman, nor child may ever see your treacherous face again, you shall wear this mask for the term of your natural life. The mask closes around his face. The workers melt the loc McCullen SCREAMS. AND WE PUSH IN on the RED SQUARE MEDALL
The many flags of NATO flap outside its massive headquart
War used to be the exception. Now it is the new state of play, a constant, unavoidable...
The RED SQUARE MEDALLION around the neck of JAMES McCULLE gazing over a lectern in a darkened room. Like his doomed ancestor, McCullen carries a proud defiance in his eyes.

Tragic as they are to fight, wars must be won. But perhaps they don't have to be as destructive as they've been in the past. A SERIES OF COMPLEX SCHEMATICS rolls continuously on a sc behind him. McCullen is briefing twenty-two NATO MILITARY COMMANDERS, many of them listening in TRANSLATION HEADPHO

Nano-mites. Perfect little soldiers. Their size can be programmed as well as their intended task. Originally developed to isolate and destroy cancer cells, but at Mars Industries, and with the help of a little NATO funding... 4. A few laughs around the room. McCullen soaks it up.

.we discovered how to program them to eliminate most anything. For instance... metal. ON SCREEN: A SOLDIER fires a shoulder-launched missile at tank. The warhead bursts into millions of SILVER MICROSCO NANO-MITES which eat away the metal like piranhas devouri horse. Then the NANO-MITES fan out from the consumed tank quickly head for a nearby jeep.

Once the target has been destroyed, the launcher triggers a kill switch unique to each warhead that short- circuits the nano-mites, preventing any unwanted destruction. ON SCREEN: The Soldier hits a KILL SWITCH on the launcher the NANO-MITES instantly "drop dead" around the nearby je

Each warhead contains seven million nano-mites and has the ability to eat anything from a single tank to an entire city. (to consummate salesman) But without innocent casualties. Which is why this has been such a priority for me and my company. The room breaks into APPLAUSE. FOCUSES ON GENERAL HAWK, a British veteran or countless battles, not buying it.
Guess you'll be the first arms dealer up for the Nobel Peace Prize. Laughter in the room. McCullen smiles, being a good sport

I prefer the term "armament solutions engineer" (more chuckles) Gentlemen! I'm pleased to announce that tomorrow morning your first order of nanotech warheads will ship from my factory in Kyrgyzstan. 5.

FOUR GLASS-LIKE WARHEADS, each the size of a softball, ar placed into four separate compartments inside a WEAPONS C by a pair of LAB WORKERS. The KILL SWITCHES are secured n to each warhead. As the case is closed and locked we see MARS Industries RED SQUARE MEDALLION LOGO on its cover.

A PAIR OF DOG TAGS drop INTO FRAME in SLOW MOTION. We see name: "HAUSER, CONRAD R." Still not seeing his face, we w our soldier strap into his BODY ARMOR and clip on his BAT HARNESS. His NAME TAG simply reads: "DUKE". He loads his the mirror (is that a look of disdain?) and we get our fi glimpse of our hero, a handsome, rugged combat veteran wi BATTLE SCAR under his right eye. The sound of RETCHING comes from the stall behind Duke. T is a flush and a strapping young Special Forces Soldier, STALWORTH, steps out. He goes to the sink next to Duke an splashes water on his face. He's pale and sweaty.
The hell's wrong with you, Stalworth, you didn't eat that Chicken A La King at chow did ya?
The mission, sir...
What about it? Another day, another run.
Never had anything to worry about before. Stalworth's shaky hand pulls a photo out and shows it to Duke: A YOUNG MOTHER with a NEWBORN in her arms.
Three weeks old. Be seeing him for the first time next leave. Duke looks at the picture, then at Stalworth. His eyes go distant thinking about his own past, then they harden aga 6.
You're off the mission.
Sir?
That's what you want, right? Stalworth doesn't argue. Duke hands him back the photo.
If your head's with them, you're no good to me. Stalworth nods. Duke steps closer, now one mean s.o.b.
One thing, though: you step off this one, you're out of Special Forces. Gonna find you a nice desk and chair back at the base. You're be run of the mill. Regular.
I... I guess I can live with that.
Then you should. Stalworth nods, grabs his kit, and leaves. Duke's hard ey watch him go, then a slight smile creases his lips ...

McCullen exits the briefing room into the corridor outsid shaking hands with various Military Commanders. Hawk watc with his aide, a gorgeous German Lieutenant, COURTNEY "CO GIRL" KRIEGER. When McCullen is alone, Hawk makes his mov
Mr McCullen, Clayton Aernathy, British Army.
(shaking hands) I know who you are General hawk. As sharp in a briefing room as your reputation is on the battlefield. 7.
Not hardly ...You gave me a broad target, I couldn't resist.
It's an honor to meet a man of your many accomplishments. McCullen smiles, then offers Hawk to walk with him.
What's on your mind, General?
Your warheads. Securing them in transit. Forty pairs of ears in that room now know the when and where.
Those "ears" all have top security clearance.
We both know what that's worth.

Look, General, delivery is my responsibility and it's not one I take lightly. I had NATO assign an elite American Special Forces unit, a fully armored convoy with air support. I assure you, my warheads will be quite safe.
I've made a career of showing up where I'm needed, whether ordered to or not. And if your warheads are half as effective as you say they are.. Then my unit is needed.
This is no time to play catch up. The NATO team's been drilling for weeks. They're lit up and ready to roll.
My unit doesn't need mission specific training. They're chosen because of their ability to handle any situation. 8.
Maybe next time, General... (moves to go, stops) What did you say your unit was called?
I didn't. I just said they were always ready. McCullen continues on down the hall. Hawk gives Cover Gir look, she reads it and nods. WE SMASH CUT TO:

A FOUR MAN SECURITY DETAIL escorts two LAB WORKERS as the enter a high-tech delivery bay and wlak past two "COUGAR" PATROL VEHICLES and a huge ARMORED "GRIZZLY TRUCK, all ar with state-of-the-art rooftop weapons. FIFTEEN SPECIAL FO SOLDIERS stand at attention in front of Duke.
All right, listen up, the Cougars will be front and back, Grizzly in the middle carrying the package. Minimum distance at all times. Choppers will cover us overhead. The Lab Workers step up.

Captain Hauser. Duke turns to them and start signing forms as WALLACE "RIPCORD" WEEMS takes the case while a little short on academic credentials, Rip is long on confidence, charm, a courage. These two guys are as close as brothers, for bet and for worse. Rip looks at the Lab Guy with a jokey grin
Not gonna explode, is it?

(dead serious) They're not weaponized yet. And the kill switches are attached to the launchers. All the same, I'd avoid potholes if I were you. Ripcord stares, then quickly hand the case off to another soldier. Duke shoots him a look and Ripcord shrugs, what? 9.
Why not stick it in a chopper and fly it out? If you want, I could--
--We have our orders. Okay, people! We're on the clock, let's move.
Duke gives Rip another look. Rip throws him a cheesy grin The team mounts up. The weapons case to Grizzly. ENGINES ignite. HEADLIGHTS beam. And the convoy rolls out.
The convoy charges out of the heavily guarded factory gat passing a sign: "MILITARY ARMAMENTS RESEARCH SYNDICATE". BLACKHAWK HELICOPTERS swoop in and follow the convoy.
Ripcord drives the lead Cougar, Duke beside him. Two more guys in back, remotely panning a rooftop DUAL MACHINE GUN
(into radio) Mother Goose, this is Bird Dog. We have the package and are on the dot to make Ganci Air Base ar 0900.
You know, I hate all the Mother Goose, bird Dog crap, I just wish they'd let us say, "Hey, Pete, it's Bill, see ya in a few."
Not me, I joined up for the jargon.
Roger that, Bird Dog. Mother Goose out.
Just saying, you know, if I ran things... 10.
Rip, if you ran the Army we'd stay up all night, fill our canteen with tequila, and call each other "Bro".
But we'd be badasses, right Bro?
(with a sigh) Yeah, we'd be badasses. Eyes on the road, Rip.
The two Blackhawks sweep through the skies, silhouetted b the rising sun. Below them, the convoy is thundering down winding road amid the magnificent Tian Shan Mountain Rang
A RADAR DISH on the rear Cougar sweeps vigilantly. Inside SPECIAL FORCES SOLDIER watches the RADAR MONITOR, clear except for two steady :signatures", the Blackhawks.
In the lead Cougar, Duke and Ripcord keep their eyes out.
Hey Duke, ya know how they always tell you to empty your head of distracting thoughts on these runs?
Keep your eyes on the road, Rip.
And you know how people sometimes joke that it must be easy fr me to keep my mind empty?
Don't listen to 'em. you got plenty of thoughts up there. (into radio) Keep rear security tight, boys. 11.
Well, the second I try and make myself not have thoughts, I always have 'em. Like now, know what I'm thinking about?
Please don't say the Air Forces.
The Air Forces.
I thought we were done with that discussion.
You were done with it, not me. Look, I loev flying... Duke "mouths" the following sentence as Ropcord says it:
I've been flying since I was thirteen years old. Ripcord shoots him a look. Duke just smiles.
I don't think your daddy's crop duster counts as hours logged.
Jets, man, jets. You know I always qualify when I'm on leave.
Yeah, yeah, look, you want to get up in the air, we'll get you a trampoline back at the base.
We've done ten years in the Army, I just think we should see if the grass really is greener.
This continues to be the stupidest idea you've ever come up with, nd that's saying something.
Funny. Real funny. 12.
I don't wanna transfer to the Air Force, okay?
It's always about you, isn't it? Give me one good reason?
I want to be in the fight, not flying over it.
Won't be saying that when you call in an air strike and I come screaming in to save your--
--Eyes on the road, Rip.
Behind the Blackhawks and the convoy an ominous, DARK SHA suddenly drops INTO FRAME. ENGINE EXHAUST blurs our view the aircraft, but we can tell that it's pursuing the conv
On the rear Cougar's RADAR SCREEN, we see the two Blackha signatures still appearing in position.. .but nothing els
They hit a pothole. Ripcord grimaces, then realizes--
Hey, on the training run weren't there herders around here? This puts Duke instantly on the alert.

Too late. CONCUSSION CANNONS slide out of ports on both s of the dark shape. They fire simultaneously. The SUBATOMI BLASTS punch into the front Blackhawk, crushing it like a beer can on your forehead. It explodes and drops. 13.
Duke and Rip see the hall of flaming metal crash in front them, blocking the convoy's path. Rip hits the brakes.
Jesus Christ! Bird Down!
(urgent, but utterly calm) Back up! Back up! Back up! (into radio) Mother Goose, this is Bird Dog. We are under attack. Repeat --we are under attack!

The second Blackhawk pivots to see the dark shape, --it's like a giant helicopter without rotors, hovering on six J THRUSTERS. It's a next-gen "TYPHOON" GUNSHIP. The Blackhawk hoses the Typhoon with its six-barrelled MI GUNS. But the rounds bounce off the Typhoon's angled armo The CONCUSSION CANNONS fire at the second Blackhawk, catc it on the nose, crushing it into a flaming ball and sendi it reeling ass-over-tail-rotor into the ground behind the rear Cougar, hemming in the convoy. The Grizzly launches two HEAT-SEEKING MISSILES off its ro turret, but the Typhoon guns them down and fires again. T blast lands directly on top of the rear Cougar, literally flattening it as well as every tree within a hundred feet
Duke sees it all in his rear view mirror, yells into RADI
Out! Everyone get out of the vehicles! Now!

A final CONCUSSION BLAST lands between the last two vehic now. Spinning the Grizzly. It's WINDOWS SHATTER and a thousand lethal GLASS SHARDS shoot inside, killing the drivers. The Cougar flips end over and lands in a ditch. 14.
Duke and Ripcord land on the upturned ceiling, beat to sh Duke quickly checks on the two guys in back crushed to de where the blast caved in the Cougar's armor. He looks at
You okay?
(DAZED)
Yeah, except for all the blood. Duke sees blood on the back of Rip's head. Then they hear LOUD ROAR and turn to see the Typhoon hover by the Grizzl
Who the hell is that? Duke grabs Ripcord and starts dragging him out.

A SIDE DOOR on the Typhoon hisses open to reveal six "VIPERS", menacing foot soldiers clad head to toe in blac BATTLE ARMOR, and armed with fearsome PULSE RIFLES. They the Typhoon and spread out to kill anyone left. The decimated Special Forces troops in the Grizzly OPEN F with ASSAULT RIFLES, but the bullets can't penetrate the Viers' armor. The Vipers fire back, the impact from their pulse rifles crush the soldiers' bodies, armor and all, a fling them backwards. Two Soldiers pop two FRAGMENTATION GRENADES and toss them toward the Typhoon. The Vipers shoot one grenade out of t air with their pulse rifles. It EXPLODES well out of rang the other grenade lands on the ground int he middle of th pack. Another shot from a pulse rifle punches the grenade feet underground. A DULL WHOOMP, lifts the ground by a fo Meanwhile, another figure emerges out of the Typhoon. Lon slender legs in high black boots, the rest if her covered black, form-fitting BODY ARMOR. She's beautiful, exotic, most of all, lethal. She's known in certain circles only "THE BARONESS" but we will know her as ANA. Her DARK GLAS glint menacingly as she strides towards the Grizzly. The two Special Forces Soldiers who threw the grenades po to shoot her. But she quick-draws a pair of PULSE PISTOLS BOOM! BOOM! The shots crush both soldiers. 15. Ana flips the pistols back into her holsters as a Viper b the back door off the Grizzly, allowing her to climb insi She blithely steps around the corpses and removes the WEA CASE. Duke now has Rip ver his shouders and is running like hel
Duke?
Shut up.
If I die...
You're not gonna die.
I just want you to know... you never could run worth a damn.
Jesus, Rip.

I'm just saying, it's be nice if you could move a little faster. And that's when the Cougar blows, a concussive blast. Ana turns with the weapons case in time to see Duke and Rip g ass-over-teacups down into a ditch. She touches the stem her glasses which ZOOM IN on Duke. DOWN IN THE DITCH: Duke rolls over and looks at Rip.
Stay here.
(really messed up) Sure.

I'm gettin' that package. Duke leaps up and hauls-ass down the ditch, then crouch-r up the embankment. --And comes face to face with a Viper, raises his pulse rifle, about to blow Duke away. A hand clamps down over the barrel. The Viper looks at Ana beside him. Duke also looks at her flash of shocking recognition ripples across his face. 16. Ana touches the stem of her glasses and the DARK LENSES t clear, revealing her gorgeous eyes.
What the hell...? Her face softens hesitantly.
Hello, Duke... Then she round house kicks him with her boot across the f knocks him out on his ass.

You have to admit you had that coming. Ana struggles with something going on inside her head. Th her face reluctantly hardens and she takes her hand off t first Viper's gun barrel, giving Duke an apologetic look.

Good-bye, Duke. Duke can't believe it. Ana suddenly glances up at somethi behind Duke. It's a "HOWLER" TRANSPORT rocketing onto the scene, its four-winged JET THRUSTERS rotating ninety degr to slow it into a hover. Duke takes the opportunity to ju to his feet and lay out in the Viper. Ana turns and hauls ass. A BLACK-CLAD FIGURE fast ropes down out of the Howler and lands behind a Viper and SNAPS his neck. Moving in a blur draws and buries a KATANA BLADE into another Viper. Then glances at the last Viper who's lining up on him, too far away to reach with his sword. He quick-draws a GLOCK PIST BAM! Right between the eye slit in his helmet. All this i the space of six breathless seconds. Duke glances at the almost mystical figure of SNAKE-EYES sheathing his sword on his back while holstering his smok Glock. RED NINJA CLAN MARKING on his tri-cep. Bad-ass defined. Snake-Eyes leaps behind the Cougar wreck as a pu burst just missed him. Duke immediately takes off after A his eyes locked on the weapons case in her hands, PULSE BURSTS crackling past his head. He curses under his breat

Air Force.. .right. 17. A Viper lines up on Duke, but a laser-like ARROW BOLT rip through his eye-slit and ELECTROCUTES him, courtesy of SH "SCARLETT" O'HARA who fast-ropes down from the Howler, holding a gas-propulsion CROSSBOW PISTOL. She lines up on another Viper, but he's too quick, ducks behind the GRIZZ But Scarlett's CROSSBOW PISTOL viewfinder snapped an imag his FACE ARMOR. She darts behind the COUGAR WRECK with Sn Eyes, swiftly targeting the Viper's eye-slit on her pisto LED SCREEN. Then she fires behind her, in the complete ot direction to the Viper, the arrow bolt flies away, then t around and zeroes in on the Viper, finding him behind cov the smart-arrow slams right through his eye-slit. Another Viper sees this and bolts toward the Typhoon, but LAMONT "HEAVY DUTY" MORRIS leans out of the landing Howle holding a dual MACHINE GUN/GRENADE LAUNCHER. Only a man t big can carry such a weapon.

Time to lay down some bass! He fires a grenade and the Viper flies back OUT OF FRAME. blink, you miss it. BOOM! The Typhoon fires at Heavy Duty but the Howler is just as nimble, fires its LEFT-SIDE THRUSTERS which roll it onto its side. The CONCUSSION BLA whip past and decimate the forest behind it. Hanging awkwardly, Heavy Duty fires a double blast of hand grenad The Typhoon's mini-gun quickly shoots them out of the air The Howler fires MISSILES which hit the CONCUSSION CANNON and rip them apart. The Typhoon SHAKES. Ana races for the recovering Typhoon. Duke races after her through a hail o pulse-fire and draws his PISTOL.
Ana! She whirls around, drawing the weapons case over her ches and face, using it as a shield. Duke hesitates, because o the warheads or Ana? Heavy Duty goes to shoot at her.

The warheads! Heavy Duty reluctantly doesn't shoot, everyone watching A backpedal towards the waiting Typhoon. Duke charges like bull and tackles her. Ana sprawls and the case tumbles fr Duke and Ana go eye-to-eye for a split second, then Duke after the case while the Joes take the opportunity to spr gunfire her way. Ana zigs, zags, and dives into the Typho which is raked by the bullets. 18. Duke grabs up the case as the Typhoon launches into the s and disappears over a rise ... SILENCE... Scarlett, Snake-eyes and Heavy Duty now approa Duke, who whirls around at them, pistol up, eyes wild.
Stand down! Stand the hell down!
Lower your weapon, Sir. We're not the enemy.
Pointing weapons at me doesn't make you my friend. ABEL "BREAKER" SHAZ jumps out of the Howler wearing a computerized SURVEILLANCE SUIT, a French/Tunisian ACCENT:
Please hand over the case, sir.

I don't know who you are, and I sure as hell don't know who they are, and until I find out, I'm not lowering anything or handling anything over. CLICK-CLACK. They turn to see Ripcord shouldering a rifle
What's your unit?
That's classified. Snake-Eyes discreetly grabs SHRUNKEN THROWING STARS from belt, but a look from Scarlett makes him out them back.
Someone would like a word with you. Breaker sets a holo-projector on the ground in front of D which projects a 3D IMAGE OF GENERAL HAWK. Duke is stunne
State you name and rank.
.you first. 19.
My team just saved your life. now's the part where you say "thank you".
Those aren't the words that come to mind just now. We weren't told about any support for this mission, so you better tell your team to stand down. Ripcord eyes his sight.
Happy to turn this into a turkey shoot. Someone OFF-PROJECTOR hands Hawk a file, he looks at it.
You must be... Ripcord, expert marksman, weapons specialist, jet
(to Duke) Told ya.
I'm General Clayton Abernathy. You may have heard of me, .Duke. A glint of recognition flickers across Duke's eyes, he no
General hawk. Afghanistan, NATO Forward Command... Breaker sees his chance and gingerly steps up to Duke and starts sweeping a scanner across the case. Hawk smiles.
That was my last job. (a twinkle in his eye) I'm in a whole new outfit now. Duke swivels his gun to Breaker's head. Breaker flinches.
Just need to deactivate its tracking beacon, for security. 20.
Hand over the weapons case son, and let us deliver the warheads.
No way. I signed for 'em. My mission, my package. I carry them, I deliver them. Breaker's scanner BEEPS. He keys a button. The BEEPING promptly stops. He throws a look at Duke.
Wasn't hard, was it?
Fine. But you seem to be a little short on transportation a the moment. Team Alpha will deliver you to me.
And where exactly are you, General?
Hawk stands in front of a HOLO-CAM amongst a sea of computers, Cover Girl behind him, Duke on a monitor.
Come see for yourself.
The Howler skims over the GIANT PYRAMIDS OF GIZA, a carav of camels below. The aircraft continues out into the gold desert, too fast for anybody to get a good look at it.
Scarlett is cleaning Ripcord's head wound.
Hey, you're cute.
He's going into shock.
What's your name, darlin'? 21. Snake-Eyes stabs Ripcord hard int he arm with a drip-need Rip angrily eyeballs him and stifles a scream.
I thought all the Special Ops guys were tough.

We are tough ... . but also sensitive. (feeling the drugs) Whoa, that's some mucho primo stuff you gave me. Rip is high now, his eyes float up to Heavy Duty who star back at him. Rip reaches out to touch his well-cropped ha
.and a kung-fu grip.
The name's Heavy Duty. Duke has the weapons case on his lap.

What kind of outfit is this? Not regular Army based on the accents. (to Scarlett) I have you as an Aussie... (looks to Heavy Duty) And you're a Johannesburger... (then Breaker) And you: French North Africa. Algiers?
Tunisia. Where were you born?
Are you kidding me? Duke wasn't born, he was Government-Issued!
But somehow you're all in the same unit. One you can't tell me the name of right?
We'd get tossed for telling. 22.
Duke, Duke, don't you get it: they're super secret, they're Mission Impossible. This tape's gonna self-destruct in five--
--You're gonna go after them aren't you? The ones that hit my convoy. (SILENCE)
Then whoever you are, whatever this unit is, I want in.
Not our call. Ripcord sits up, really woozy, looks at Scarlett.

I want in too. That way we can spend some bunker time together. A SWORD suddenly slices across Rip's face, an inch away. Snake-Eyes, checking his blade, seemingly innocent. But t message is not lost on Ripcord. Scarlett looks at Duke.
You two a team or something?
We've been together forever. (off her look) But not like that. Hi, I'm Ripcord.
Why do they call you that? Breaker laughs, reading Ripcord's file:
Because his name is Wallace Weems!

Eight SECURITY TECHNICIANS sit around an island console i small, windowless room. Working their keyboards and watch the HOLOGRAPHIC IMAGE of the Howler soaring across the du A technician hits a LARGE SWITCH on his console.
Alpha-One, this is Base. You are cleared or entry. 23.

And a huge sand dune directly in front of Howler spirals to reveal a CAVERNOUS HOLE. The Howler's THRUSTERS twist vertical and it drops like a helicopter into the hole. SUPER: Global Integrated Joint Operating Entity.

The Howler descends beneath the surface onto a dark platf as the roof spirals shut and FLOOD LIGHTS switch on. The of the howler opens and the team steps out. Duke and Ripc follow hesitantly with the weapons case. A VOICE calls ou them from the shadows:
Welcome to the new Pit! Duke and Ripcord turn to see hawk and Cover girl walking from behind the lights.
Duke.
General.
I've read a lot about you two.
Okay, look, I didn't "steal" that Blackhawk, I was borrowing it... Duke shoots him a look. Hawk steps right up to Duke.
Matter of fact, I saw that one of my subordinates tried to recruit you to our little operation a while back.
I was never asked to join any Op group.
Remember a tall gentleman approaching you in Thailand when you were on leave, four years ago? 24.
Vaguely.
Right before you tore up the bar?
Four years? My man had some issues. Duke shoots him another look, then turns back to Hawk.
This doesn't look like any Tac Op I've ever seen. Where are we?

Okay, you trusted me by going with my team, so I'll trust you. There's a loud METALLIC CLANG and part of the PLATFORM be to descend. They pass the URBAN COMBAT LEVEL where MEN an WOMEN are training with next-gen urban warfare equipment.

Technically, GI JOE doesn't exist. But if it did, it'd be comprised of the top men and women from the best military units all over the world. The alpha dogs... They see a pretty woman sip into a next-gen CAMO-SUIT, wh reflects and refracts light, making her nearly invisible.
Oh man, I want one of those.
The suit or the girl?
Both. Scarlett's eyes roll. They descend into the DESERT COMBAT level, where soldiers train with desert warfare equipment
Ten nations signed on in their first year. Working together, sharing intel. Now we have twenty- three. 25.
I've never seen combat gear this sleek, what's the trick?
Liquid armor. They reach the DEEP SEA COMBAT LEVEL where dozens of men women are testing fantastic next-gen UNDERWATER VEHICLES.
Good news is we've been pretty successful so far. The bad news is whenever we manage to shut down one organization, another springs up in its place.
Who could possibly fund all this?
Oprah.
Hawk now leads the group into the Control Room where more TECHNICIANS man consoles. Duke still has the weapons case
Mr. McCullen's standing by, Sir.
Patch him through, please.
So who hit us out there?
Currently unidentified.
And how'd that bitch in leather get a jump jet like ours?
Whoever she is, she's clearly well- financed, with access to highly classified intel and state of the art weaponry. Their capabilities are beyond anything we've ever encountered. 26.
That's the reason we got our asses kicked. Duke betrays nothing. Hawk looks at him.
We're going to need to find out everything we can about her. Knowing is half the battle.
What's the other half? McCullen now appears next to Ripcord and walks through hi
Jesus! And we realize McCullen is here courtesy of a HOLO-PROJEC A ring of cameras provides him with images of the Joes.

Gentlemen, this is James McCullen, CEO of MARS Industries, the man who built these warheads. WE INTERCUT THIS SCENE WITH McCullen standing in front of HOLO-CAM in a small room somewhere. THE HOLOGRAPHIC IMAGE hawk, Duke, and the others around him.

(to Duke) How do you say "we're the good guys" in French? Meanwhile, Snake-Eyes evades all the chaos by leaping up under the south base, scaling the iron lattice like a mon 78. ON THE FIRST FLOOR: Ana and Storm Shadow crest the stairs and rudely push through the crowd to the stairway on the opposite side of the floor. Another SECURITY GUARD draws gun on them but Storm Shadow snatches the weapon out of t man's hands, swatting him with the butt, all without miss a step. The crowd panics and runs screaming for the stair --where Duke and Ripcord are struggling to catch up. The avalanche of tourists slows their progress. Underneath th stairway, however, Snake-Eyes continues to climb fast wit a safety net. He makes it to the first floor and races af Ana and Storm Shadow. ON THE GROUND: The Brawler screeches up. Scarlett's first out with Breaker and Heavy Duty behind her. All of them carrying weapons. The Security Guards instantly go on the defensive as they hurry up to the stairway. Guns go up. Scarlett speaks to them urgently in French.

(French, subtitled) Don't shoot! We're a special anti- terrorist unit! There's a bomb up there! POLICE CARS are now rushing up behind them. ON THE SECOND FLOOR: Ana and Storm Shadow speed over to t main tower ELEVATOR and barge their way inside. Storm Sha hurls the ELEVATOR OPERATOR out as Ana opens the weapons and removes one of the NANOTECH WARHEADS and its KILL SWI Through the stunned crowd, they see Snake-Eyes reach the of the stairs behind. Ana rolls the warhead towards him while Storm Shadow lines up on him with the Security Guar pistol as if to shoot him. Snake-Eyes glares defiantly at Storm Shadow who just grins and lowers his gun at the warhead. A SINGLE SHOT AND THE WARHEAD EXPLODES. Snake-Eyes recoil ON THE GROUND: Everyone hears the warhead detonate. ON THE FIRST FLOOR: Duke and Ripcord freeze. ON THE SECOND FLOOR: A BURST OF NANO-MITES spreads out in all directions. Storm Shadow closes the ELEVATOR DOORS an hits a button for the top. The elevator races upwards as everything else gets eaten by the ravenous NANO-MITES. Th floor begins to disappear. Tourists stampede towards the stairs. A LITTLE GIRL is thrown from her MOTHER'S GRIP. T mother screams out for her child as the girl goes over th railing. 79. ON THE FIRST FLOOR: a hundred feet up, Duke and Rip see h coming. Ripcord swings out and catches the girl just in time. Above them, the tower is dissolving before their ey Duke sees Snake-Eyes being pushed down the stairs by the tourists. He leaps up onto the iron lattice.
Where you going?
Each warhead has a kill switch.
It's too late! We gotta get off this thing!

Those nano-mites will level the entire city! Duke climbs up the side of the tower with his Accelerator Suit. Rip things about following, but then looks at the little girl in his arms, who smiles and hugs him. Snake-E grabs him and they join the flow of people down the stair The NANO-MITES chasing them close behind. Below them, Scarlett, Breaker, and Heavy Duty are helping the police evacuate the Tower. INSIDE THE ELEVATOR: Ana and Storm Shadow race to the top

(into mike) Be ready to pick up in thirty seconds. IN THE SKIES: The Typhoon gunship rockets towards the top the disintegrating Eiffel Tower, its SIDE DOOR opening. ON THE TOWER: Duke scales the tower, the NANO-MITES chasi him up. His eyes on the elevator as it reaches the top de just above him. The Typhoon fires a blast of its CONCUSSI CANNONS at Duke, knocking him off the tower. He falls, bu manages to catch the tower just below, the NANO-MITES alm on top of him now. The climbs even faster. ON THE TOP DECK: The elevator arrives. Ana and Storm Shad calmly walk out and climb the railing as the Typhoon hove up beside them. Below them, Duke sees them board. The tow groans and wobbles. It's a long way down. Time has run ou Ana and Storm Shadow jump into the Typhoon. 80. With the NANO-MITES at his heels, Duke clambers up and ju up off the side of the Tower, sailing up through the air latching onto the SIDE DOOR of the Typhoon. IN THE TYPHOON: The gunship rocks with his sudden weight. Ana and Storm Shadow almost lose their footing. Duke spri inside. He smacks Storm Shadow down and grabs the KILL SWITCH from Ana, pressing the trigger. Immediately, the NANO-MITES pulse with light and fall to ground around the Eiffel Tower. The Tower groans, half-eaten, then topples over on its si Ripcord and Snake-Eyes scurry out of the way as it crashe down onto the Seine, sending up an enormous explosion of water. The shock on the faces of everyone around reverberates through the entire Joe team. Ripcord keeps h eyes on the Typhoon as it pulls away. Breaker suddenly ge an idea.
Come on! He hauls-ass.
Ana looks at Duke, a pursed smile on her lips.
You just saved Paris. Storm Shadow is not happy at all, he TASERS Duke, who dro hard to the floor of the Typhoon.

A crowd has gathered around the crashed Scarab. Heavy Dut yanks one of the dead Neo-Vipers out. Breaker yanks off t guy's HELMET then removes a needle-like PORT PLUG from hi SURVEILLANCE SUIT. Scarlett moves into position to help h Ripcord kneels down.
What are you doing?
Plugging into his cerebral cortex. With a SICKENING CRUNCH, Breaker plunges the needle into top of the Neo-Viper's head. Ripcord winces at the sight. 81.
The brain survives for a couple of minutes after death. We can read his most recent memories.
Can you find Duke?

If this guy remembers the way home we can. INSERT: A FLASH OF MEMORIES appearing on Breaker's HUD. Duke shooting him in the face, racing along the highway, driving the ARMORED CAR. As the images continue, we PUSH on the Neo-Viper's open eyes and CUT TO:
McCullen watching Breaker and Ripcord through the dead Ne Viper's eyes on a screen. He turns to the Doctor urgently
Destroy that unit immediately. The Doctor removes his PDA and taps a key to draw up the Viper's file. He clicks a button that reads "TERMINATE".
Instantly, the Neo-Viper's body snaps rigid and begins to shake. Everyone gets a shock. Backing up.
He's still alive!
He's not alive.
You ever seen a dead guy do that?
They activated a self-destruct. The Neo-Viper's body starts to decay before them. Thousan of NANO-MITES literally eating away at his flesh and bone
Nano-mites! 82.
They're eating him!
Hurry, Breaker! But the NANO-MITES are too fast. The Neo-Viper's legs are now gone. His chest and arms next. Breaker rapidly scans through the MEMORY FLASHES. But now the NANO-MITES consum his head.
McCullen watches Breaker's frantic face suddenly disappea his screen. He gives the Doctor a smile.
Breaker looks crestfallen at the empty Neo-Viper suit in arms. Ripcord kneels beside him, stunned and bereft.
You did the best you could.
Relax, I got it.
You got it? (CONFUSED)
Well, what was the "NOO!" for?
That was for McCullen. There is the sound of weapons being raised. The team look to see they are surrounded by FRENCH POLICE and PARATROOP
(in French) Put your hands in the air! The Joes trade looks, shrug and raise their hands.
(under his breath) We don't have time for this. 83. SCARLETT It's agains friendly for t orders to engage with ces.
The onl about i Dukendly force I care

Ripcord suddenly S Forces' heads. Some hit the PRAYS a burst of crashes through t deck. gunfire over the French to grab him , he French line. Ripcord charges , and though A DOZEN PARATR forward, AND he fights, they take OOPERS OPERS manage WE SMASH CUT TO: A him down hard. The Joes sit alone FRENCH POLICE HOLDING CEL
who bears some bruisbenches. Heavy fight.DutY stares at Ripcord,
Nice.

It'snot his emotional. fault. He's just... Scarlett and a French Detect Rip share a look. On the other SUIT o curiously examines n a desk. Bre aker jumps up to Breakerssde Rf the bars the bars. Please, BREAKER touch that. Please, don't
touching It's very... Okayit. , Please! Sir. Sir, How do RIPCORD you say "lawyer" in French?
If we could get on a Might be to computer we longitude able Input the partial les g es latitude, and Viper, figu the downloaded from tha t re out their locati
(to Ripcord) It'll be a military when they're done tribunal. need a lawyer. We with us And 'll need diapers. 84.
(to himself) Think, think, think... (to the Joes) At some point they gotta feed us or take us out for the interrogation. When they do I'll jump the lead Guard. Heavy, you go for his weapon and--
--Start an international incident.
I'm not gonna just sit here!
This is bigger than Duke.
What if it was one of you? What if they had Heavy or Scarlett, what would you do? The Joes trade looks - rock and a hard place.
We're not doing Duke a damned bit of good sitting here. If it was reversed, Duke would be kicking down every door between here and the freakin' moon 'til he found me.
And we'll do the same for him as soon as we get out of here. She has a thought and turns to Breaker.
Partial? You said partial latitude and longitude.
We only got the one coordinate-- 90 degrees, then the image went to snow.
Maybe it was the whole coordinate, just 90 degrees latitude. (they all look at her) (MORE)
Before the image went to snow,...it's the polar ice cap. RIP'S DOG TAGS hit the floor and slide to his feet. The J all look up to see several POLICE OFFICIALS looking at th
The Joes are led down a hallway.
They did away with the guillotine, right? They arrive at a door. The door is opened to reveal a man a wheelchair, back turned. When he spins around, it's Haw
General! Hawk just shakes his head and sighs heavily.
The Joes sit around the General, mid-discussion.
How long before we're released?
The French government is allowing you to leave on the condition that none of you ever return. Other agencies will be handling this from here on.
What?!

The heads of state of every member of GI JOE are recalling their operatives. We are now considered a rogue unit, uncontrollable. Shut down. We're to report to Washington for debriefing. Hawk rolls his wheelchair to the door.
That's it? They've got Duke! 86. Hawk stops his wheelchair, turns to them.
I said you were to report to Washington. I didn't say when, or which route to take.
Maybe a northern one. Hawk smiles and wheels out the door.
A NIGHT RAVEN rockets through the orange skies, SMASHING through the sound barrier with an ear-tingling SONIC BOOM
Storm Shadow sits in a meditative state. Duke is shackled hands bound, out of his ACCELERATOR SUIT. Ana steps out o the cockpit area and approaches him, nods to Storm Shadow
He thinks I should kill you.
Why don't you?
James wants to meet you in person.
James?
Mr McCullen.
Ana listen--
--Talk softly, or he'll tazer you again.
(raises his bound hands) Loosen these, he'll never taser anything again. She taps the bonds on his wrists. 87.
I should've thought of this before. They almost share a smile.
Let me get this straight. You're with McCullen. You're married to that Baron. And you claim you're still in love with me.
I'm a complex woman.
Maybe you just don't know who you are anymore.
Who I was died long ago.
No, this isn't you, I still see the person I loved behind your eyes. Her eyes soften for a moment.
Tell me what she was like.

She was smart, and funny. She was loyal as hell. She loved those she was close with, me, her brother... (agonized pause) I did my best. With Rex. I'm sorry. He was my responsibility. I should have... It's why I left, Ana. Why I couldn't be with you. You were in so much pain... I thought the sight of me just give you more. She seems to be affected by this ever so slightly, then.. hard, cold look comes to her eyes, she shakes her head.
It doesn't matter now.
No, it matters very much. We have the chance to make things right. 88.
Nothing will ever be right again. Duke stares at her, his heart ripped apart. WE PUSH IN ON the two of them and FLASHBACK TO:

Rain is drizzling on a military cemetery. Ana sits alone, without family, without Duke, staring straight ahead as R casket is lowered into the ground. Parked on a nearby road is a lone car. Duke sits inside i staring at the funeral in the distance. His face tells us the anguish he's living with. He pulls out and starts to drive away, the rain on the windshield BLURS AS WE DISSOL
The Night Raven zeroes down on a stretch of ice near a hu CAVE. A SET OF RUNWAY LIGHTS appear under the ice, guidin it in for a smooth landing. The cave swallows the plane whole.

The Night Raven rolls to a stop inside the cave. The side door opens. Storm Shadow exits with the weapons case. Ana leads Duke out, two Neo-Vipers behind them. Storm Shadow clicks a hand held remote and a HIDDEN ICE WALL opens to reveal a HI-TECH DIVING BELL awaiting them. Duke uses the moment to lunge forward, grab the case and haul ass towar the cave door. Storm Shadow spins, Shurikan throwing star in his hands. The Neo-Vipers whip up their pulse rifles.

NO! McCullen has plans for him! Storm Shadow throws a star, it whistles across the cave a nails Duke in his shoulder, Duke goes down hard, staggers back up, but the Neo-Vipers are already on him, they star beating the living shit out of him. Ana jogs up.
Enough! Storm Shadow picks up the case and looks at Duke, face do bloody and beaten. 89.
And what was your plan? Run three thousand miles across the ice? He rips his star out of Duke's shoulder. Duke sucks it up
Stupid soldier. Duke rolls over and stares up at them, breathing hard.
Ripcord, Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, Heavy Duty and Breaker are the conn tower of a next-gen submarine, going over a 3-D of the polar ice cap.
That's a lotta ice.
It's gonna be like trying to find whale spit in the ocean. Breaker sees a SMALL LIGHT flashing on his Ball-Eyepiece.
That's strange.
What?
When they stole the weapons case, I set my suit to scan for the tracker beacon in case it came back on, and it just came back on. Ripcord just smiles.
That's my boy.
The DIVING BELL comes shooting down out of a shaft in the bottom of the ice cap and rockets down towards the facili 90.
As the diving bell descends, Duke stares at the facility the portal. He is awed by the immense size of the place, looks at Ana, proud of her office.
Certain work needs to be done away from the public eye.

The diving bell entry port opens, guarded by two Neo-Vipe McCullen stands waiting. His eyes first move to the weapo case in Storm Shadow's hands. Storm Shadow opens it and shows him the three remaining warheads. McCullen runs his fingers over them, then nods, Storm Shadow closes the cas
Take them to the drones. I want them ready to launch in one hour.
It will be done. And only then does McCullen greet Ana.

My beautiful Lady of the Lake... He kisses her. Ana kisses him back with slightly-feigned affection, her eyes open and on Duke. Duke stands there, impassive. McCullen finishes the kiss and turns to Duke.
This bother you? Duke says nothing, so McCullen steps closer.

Isn't it funny, with the entire balance of power in the world about to shift, a couple of guys can still have a stare down over who gets the girl. Duke takes the opportunity to HEAD BUTT McCullen. The Neo Vipers instantly pummel Duke to the floor. McCullen wipes small trickle of blood from his nose. 91.

The interesting thing about my Neo- Vipers is they still think the same thoughts they always did, they just can't act on them anymore. Instead, they do what I want. I imagine that must be very frustrating. He gets right down in Duke's face.
I'm going to make you very unhappy.
(grit teeth) I'm already happy. McCullen glances at Ana, watching the display with confli eyes. McCullen heads for the door, beckoning the Neo-Vipe to make Duke follow him.
Duke trails behind McCullen and Ana, flanked by Neo-Viper
What're you gonna do with the warheads?
You take to your training well, that's good. Still trying to develop information. Still planning to escape and stope me. Moments from now, you'll see that won't ever happen.
Then you won't mind telling me.
Isn't it clear? I'm a business man. I'm going to use them.
Millions of people are gonna die if you launch those warheads. What is it you want, McCullen? 92.
Merely to strike fear into the hearts of every man, woman, and child on the planet. Only then will they look up to the man who wields the most power, and obey him.

The control room is alive with TECHNICIANS squirreling ab various stations. Monitors show three large AERIAL DRONES sitting in vertical launch bays. Duke sees the drones and face registers the horror of what McCullen's about to do. glances at Ana, she quietly looks away, a hint of remorse her eyes? The Doctor rises to greet McCullen, glancing at Duke for several moments, as if struck by the sight of hi
Meet the genius behind all my nanotechnology.
My genius lies only in taking what others created to the logical next steps. All modern gains in science are made through theft.
You'll have to excuse his modesty, when I found him, he was --
(interrupting, re: Duke) --Another "recruit"?

Albeit a rather unwilling one. The Doctor's nano-mites can control all manner of brain functions. When you wake up, you'll be working for me, and your past will be a distant shimmer that floats in and out of your mind like a leaf on a breeze.

I'll prepare him for the surgery. The Doctor beckons the Neo-Vipers who shove Duke after hi towards another door. Duke and Ana exchange one last look McCullen keeps his eyes on her as she watches him go. 93.
A school of fish swims past the facility, one fish breaks away from the school. CAMERA ZOOMS IN TIGHT ON IT: it's n fish at all, but a mini robotic underwater spy system.
A sleek submarine drifts silently through the arctic wate
Picture's coming on line now.
In the Conn Tower of the sub, our team gathers around Bre who sits at a monitor watching what the "fish" is watchin
It's an underwater facility...
McCullen's home away from home.
Dukes' gotta be in there somewhere.
Wait, what's that? Breaker ZOOMS IN on a massive TURBO-LASER CANNON.
Oh, Jesus...That's an automated, phased array turbo-pulse battery. (off their looks) A really big gun.
Could it take out our sub?
That thing could take out a dozen subs simultaneously.
Then that's our first objective.
No, no. Duke's our first objective. 94.
The main force can't attack as long as that cannon's online.
How you figure getting it offline? Snake-Eyes points to the DIVING BELL CABLES n the monitor
Elevator cables. They've got a surface entrance. Shipwreck? She turns to the submarine commander, HECTOR "SHIPWRECK" DELGADO, a fiery Spanish naval combat veteran.
Going up, senorita? Scarlett nods and leads the others down a corridor.
Snake-Eyes, Breaker, Ripcord, and I will infiltrate the factory from above and destroy the cannon. Heavy D, as soon as we give the word, you lead the assault from outside.
(nods grimly) Go, Joes...

A quiet wind blows across a remote stretch of arctic ice. of a sudden the ice pack begins to tremble like the mothe all earthquakes. It cracks and ruptures and then erupts a the CONN TOWER of the submarine crashes through, then gri to a halt. A FORWARD HATCH OPENS and two ROCK SLIDES laun out, landing hard on the ice and speeding away. Ripcord a Breaker on one. Scarlett and Snake-Eyes on the other.
McCullen, Ana, and Storm Shadow watch monitors showing TECHNICIANS securing the warheads onto three rocket prope SMART-DRONES. As the last one is secured a Technician say
All drones prepared and ready, Sir. 95.
Good, commence the launch sequence immediately. is that a ripple of concern flickering across Ana's face?
Our team races into the ice cave on their ROCK SLIDES and park beside the dormant Night Raven. Weapons up. Scanning place from top to bottom. Ripcord stars at the awesome pl towering before him.
That McCullen's got some gadgets. Breaker gestures to the ice wall. Snake-Eyes uses his Kat sword to slice a circle in the wall and yank it out, revealing the DIVING BELL CABLES, but no diving bell.
Maybe we could slide down. Snake-Eyes shakes his head, doubtful
The arctic water would kill us.
McCullen, Ana, and Storm Shadow watch the drones sitting the launch bays on the screens. Technicians are working h
Three... two... one... ignite primary engines. The entire control room begins to shake. The screens fill with fire.

The Joes run outside, wondering what the hell is causing earthquake. A large circle of ice near them MELTS. And th the first drone EXPLODES UP before them and LAUNCHES into morning sky, peeling away to the east. Before they can re the second drone EXPLODES UP a hundred yards away, peelin off to the west. They hear the third one about to rocket 96. Snake-Eyes thinks fast, sprints into the cave, jumps on a Rock Slide, hauls-ass outside, hits a WEAPONS SWITCH on h Rock Slide, prepping two HEAT-SEEKING ROCKETS on either s of the vehicle. The third drone LAUNCHES UP from two hund yards away. Snake-Eyes locks onto its exhaust and FIRES. missiles race up after the drone and knock it out of the It EXPLODES. Metal FLIES. Snow BURNS.
The technicians see this on their monitors.
We lost one.
Lost one? What do you mean?
Bird Three is down, Sir. McCullen looks at the monitors, enraged. Storm Shadow smi
We're under attack.
Alert all defences. Charge up the pulse cannon. He turns to say something to Ana, but she has left the ro
Topside, the team watches the two remaining drones race a
What about the other two?
We find the kill switches and short out the nano-mites.
(shakes his head) They're already way out of range.
Then somebody has to go up there and shoot those things down. 97.
(PAUSE)
That's me.
Ripcord climbs into the Night Raven's cockpit. Scarlett s up to watch. He's already flipping switches and putting o FLIGHT HELMET.
Can you even fly this thing?
I can fly anything. You just track those warheads and guide me in. We don't have long until they hit.
Ripcord? He glances at her, a moment between them. Then she presse forward and kisses him on the mouth. He stares back at he
Good luck.
Do me a favor? Save Duke. She gives him a nod, then leaves. Ripcord grins to himsel

The NIGHT RAVEN tears across the ice and launches into th sky. Ripcord WHOOPS with adrenaline. Scarlett, Snake-Eyes and Breaker fast rope down into the first launch bay as t ice REFORMS behind them, hiding the hole.
We now find Duke, wearing only SURGICAL TROUSERS, strappe the operating gurney we saw Zartan on earlier. The SMART ROBOTS warming up around him as the Doctor approaches.
The atomic bomb that was dropped on Hiroshima destroyed seventy percent of the city. Seventy percent... Did you know that, Duke? 98. Duke looks at him, something familiar.

There was a bank situated less than one hundred yards from Ground Zero, destroyed of course. Only one thing survived. It's four bank vaults. And when those vaults were opened, they discovered everything inside them had survived completely unscathed.
Who are you?
Of course, the vault I took shelter in wasn't that well-made. He unclips his BREATHING TUBES and lowers the mask to rev a scarred and burned face.
Double Bubble? Duke is beyond shocked.
Rex... Rex immediately has trouble breathing and returns the mas over his face.
You sonuvabitch... Ana buried you.
A moving ceremony, I'm sure. The three volley salute. The flag on the coffin.
Why? .Why didn't you come in...?
Because I found out the truth...
Rex moves through the building with Fireteam Bravo. 99.

Intel says the lab's in the basement. Fireteam Bravo kicks open a door. They lead the way down staircase toward the basement. Rex follows, nervous as he The soldiers round a corner, suddenly, Rex hears GUNFIRE, freezes, then silence, Rex pulls out his .45 And rounds t corner to see Fireteam Bravo down. A GUARD is trying to c a jam in his machine gun. As he clears the weapon and rai it, Rex raises his .45 and fires first. The Guard drops. Rex checks Bravo, but they're not moving. He looks around basement, no lab, but he sees a massive VAULT DOOR, close He heads for the vault, 45 raised, breathing hard. WHOOSH blast of refrigerated air hits him as he opens the door. Rex enters a small room filled with DEAD ANIMALS in huge FORMALDEHYDE JARS> Something inside the animals is consta reshaping their appearances, reforming their facial bones changing the color, texture and elasticity of their skins There is a scuffling noise, Rex points his gun. A small, stooped old SCIENTIST in a lab coat appears.
Are you going to shoot me?... Rex doesn't respond.
We knew you were coming. But I couldn't walk away from it... Rex stares in awe, not what he was expecting.
Stay where you are. His gun up, he finds a COMPUTER TERMINAL and begins acces various files, starts reading them.
These aren't chemical or nuclear--
No. Something much... better.
This is beyond anything... This is light years ahead of anyone in the field. 100.

You see why I couldn't leave. Rex nods, hypnotized by the science in front of him, an instant bond formed with the man who created it. The dist sound of Jets. The Scientist moves to the vault door and begins pulling it closed as we hear the J-Dam Bunker Bust whistling towards them.
If we live, I'll show you everything...

head_text.subj: WE SMASH CUT BACK TO THE MEDICAL WING

text: Duke tries to absorb what he's learned. The Doctor contin

The man who created this technology was not our enemy. In fact, he was hired by our very own government to create it. When it was deemed too unethical, they sent us to kill him. He didn't survive the blast. But I... lived. (touches his face) And I escaped with his research. Unfortunately I tested it on myself first, and lost my lungs and vocal chords in the process. But now I've perfected it, and you will get a first-hand experience.
(his biggest concern) Does Ana know about this, about you?
No... and she never will. He glances at the SMART ROBOTS and Duke realizes.
You sick bastard... you did this to your own sister?
(INCENSED)
I loved my sister! Do you have any idea the state she was in? Me dead. You AWOL. Depression, drugs. (MORE)
So, I had her brought here, gave her a way to deal with her pain, gave her purpose. Made her strong. I gave her a new life, Duke.
Why work for McCullen?
He saved my life, for starters. Now to mention infinite resources to work in the field of my choosing.
That's bullshit. You could have had any job you wanted.
I didn't want any job. You can't play nice with science, Duke. It's sometimes necessary to experiment, to fail, even to destroy to attain a goal. It's a fact that McCullen has the guts to embrace.
(still shocked) Everything she's done, everything she's become, started because she thought you died that day.
And because you then abandoned her, let's not forget that part. And with that, he leaves Duke to the SMART ROBOTS, which menacingly begin to move in.
Scarlett, Snake-Eyes, and Breaker drop down into the laun bay. They see a chrome corridor leading into the facility
It's pressure plated and laser protected. Anyway around it?

No. Any object larger than a quarter will fry your britches. Snake-Eyes shakes his head with a sigh, then steps forwar and leaps onto the floor, landing on his fingertips. 102. Then, with incredible strength, he proceeds to walk acros the floor on his fingertips, aware of the continuous crac and hum of lasers around him. Scarlett and Breaker watch baited breath. Snake- Eyes now reaches the doorway.

What you'll have to do is rewire the laser panel's brain by-- --Snake-Eyes swiftly balances on one set of fingertips wh his other fingers grab his sword and STAB the laser panel The sound of the laser net instantly vanishes.
.or you cold just stab it.

Duke lies on the operating table as a SMART ROBOT makes a incision behind his right ear. Duke grimaces. A long need zeroes in on the incision. As the needle dives towards Du head, a hand hits a switch and the needle quickly retract Duke looks over to see Ana by the controls, gazing at him

I don't have much time. She rushes over and unties him and they stare at each oth then kiss passionately. All of a sudden, Duke feels somet behind her right ear, he turns her head, --an INCISION SC He looks at her, but before he can say anything, Ana's bo snaps rigid and falls limp in his arms.
Ana! Duke looks over to see the Doctor holding his PDA, McCull and two Neo-Vipers beside him, their rifles on Duke and A Duke gazes at Ana, desperately feeling for her pulse.
Two TECHNICIANS man the firing controls of the huge TURBO LASER CANNON. Snake-Eyes takes them out and shuts down th cannon. HE sends a quick message on his WRIST-COMMUNICATO
Heavy Duty sees the message appear on a screen. "CANNON O LINE. HAVE A NICE DAY." Heavy smiles and turns to Shipwre 103.
Let's get in this fight.

The GI JOE submarine peels around a rocky headland now, i full view of the underwater facility. A series of TORPEDO fire out of the submarine's launch tubes. Most are blown by the facility's Harpoon Cannon defenses, but several ma to hit the facility's exterior. KA-BOOM!!
The whole place SHUDDERS. Scarlett and Breaker blow the control room door and cut down the Technicians trying to shoot them. Breaker takes over a station console.
Okay, I've got a lock on the two remaining warheads. Target one is Moscow! Target Two is Washington!
Give Ripcord the coordinates.

Snake-Eyes spins to see a pair of KATANA BLADES come cras down at him from behind. He spins, but one of the blades cuts him on his left arm, sending him reeling backwards, it's Storm Shadow. Who qui powers the laser cannon back online.
